trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> com especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to use for creating the grid column style.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> a utilizar para criar o estilo de coluna da grelha.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> utilizando especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to use for creating the grid column style.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> a utilizar para criar o estilo de coluna da grelha.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set the column style as the default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>ao definir o estilo de coluna como predefinição; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which cell has the focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a célula de que tem o foco.

trans-unit.source: Not available at design time.
trans-unit.target: Não está disponível no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentCell property will cause the grid to scroll and show the cell if it is not already visible.
trans-unit.target: A definição da propriedade CurrentCell fará com que a grelha desloque-se e mostrar a célula se ainda não estiver visível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> with the focus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref> com o foco.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell*>propriedade foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell*>

trans-unit.source: To determine the current cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar a célula actual, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets index of the row that currently has focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da linha que tem actualmente o foco.

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentRowIndex property to a value other than its current value scrolls the control so that the specified row is in view.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade CurrentRowIndex como um valor diferente do respetivo valor atual desloca o controlo de forma a que a linha especificada na vista.

trans-unit.source: The CurrentRowIndex property enables you to iterate through a parent table's rows even if you are viewing the child table rows.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade CurrentRowIndex permite-lhe iterar através de linhas de uma tabela principal, mesmo se estiver a ver as linhas de tabela subordinada.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are viewing a child table, incrementing the CurrentRowIndex will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> to display the next set of records in the child table that are linked to the parent table.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se estiver a ver uma tabela subordinada, incrementando o CurrentRowIndex fará com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>para apresentar o seguinte conjunto de registos na tabela subordinada que estejam ligadas a tabela principal.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the user is viewing a parent table, or a table with no child relations, then the property returns the zero-based index of the current row.
trans-unit.target: Se o utilizador está a ver uma tabela principal, ou uma tabela com não existem relações de subordinados, a propriedade devolve o índice baseado em zero da linha actual.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the current row.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da linha actual.

trans-unit.source: There is no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Não existe nenhum <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Este membro não é significativo para este controlo.

trans-unit.source: The type of cursor to display as the mouse pointer moves over the object.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de cursor a apresentar como o ponteiro do rato se move sobre o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the CursorChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A>propriedade não é significativa para este controlo, embora o pode alterar o respetivo valor e processar o evento de CursorChanged para detetar a alteração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific list in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*> for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control displays a grid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a lista específica num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>para o qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controlo apresenta uma grelha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> contains multiple sources of data, you should set the DataMember to one of the sources.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>contém várias origens de dados, deve definir o DataMember é para uma das origens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify one of the tables to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>é um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>ou <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>que contém três tabelas com o nome `Customers`, `Orders`, e `OrderDetails`, tem de especificar uma das tabelas à qual vincular.</xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> contains only one <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, you should set the DataMember to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of that <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>ou <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>contém apenas um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>deve definir o DataMember para o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>de que <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects, parent tables will appear with a plus sign (+) in each row header.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>está definido como um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>que contenha <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>objetos, tabelas principais serão apresentada com um sinal de adição (+) no cabeçalho de cada linha.</xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the plus sign causes a node to appear that contains links to child tables.
trans-unit.target: Ao clicar no sinal faz com que um nó a aparecer que contém ligações às tabelas subordinadas.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects named `Customers` and `Orders`, setting the DataMember to the `Customers` table causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> to display a parent table with a plus sign visible on each row header.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>contém dois <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objetos com o nome `Customers` e `Orders`, definir o DataMember como o `Customers` tabela faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>para apresentar uma tabela principal com um sinal de adição visível no cabeçalho de cada linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the DataMember is set to `Orders`, however, the row headers will be blank.
trans-unit.target: Se o DataMember é definido como `Orders`, no entanto, os cabeçalhos de linha estará em branco.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, <xref:System.Data.DataView>, collection, or array, setting the DataMember property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>é um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, <xref:System.Data.DataView>, coleção ou matriz, a definição da propriedade DataMember emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > At run time, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Em tempo de execução, tem de utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>método para repor o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the DataMember property alone can be reset at any time to a valid table name.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, a propriedade DataMember por si só pode ser reposta em qualquer altura para um nome de tabela válido.

trans-unit.source: A list in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the grid is displaying data for.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a origem de dados que apresenta dados de grelha.

trans-unit.source: At run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the DataSource and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Tempo de execução, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>método para definir a origem de dados e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following data sources are valid: - A <xref:System.Data.DataTable> - A <xref:System.Data.DataView> - A <xref:System.Data.DataSet> - A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> - Any component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface - Any component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class overview for more information on data sources.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes origens de dados são válidas: - um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>- um <xref:System.Data.DataView>- um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>- um <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>-qualquer componente que implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interface - qualquer componente que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList>interface consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>Descrição geral de classe para obter mais informações sobre origens de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> </xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSource reference contains more than one table, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property a string that specifies the table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Se a referência de origem de dados contém mais de uma tabela, tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>propriedade uma cadeia que especifica a tabela à qual vincular.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the DataSource is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify the table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a origem de dados é um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>ou <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>que contém três tabelas com o nome `Customers`, `Orders`, e `OrderDetails`, tem de especificar a tabela à qual vincular.</xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Setting the DataSource to an object that does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface or an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> will cause the grid to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Definir a origem de dados para um objeto que não implementa o <xref:System.Collections.IList>interface ou um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>fará com que a grelha acionar uma excepção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar uma grelha que permite aos utilizadores editar dados, mas impede que são adicionadas linhas utilizando um <xref:System.Data.DataView>como a origem de dados e a definição de <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Para vincular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>para uma matriz de tipo seguro de objetos, o tipo de objeto tem de conter propriedades públicas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>mostra que a matriz, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `typename` onde `typename` é substituído pelo nome do tipo de objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: Tenha também em atenção que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>propriedade diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas; o nome do tipo deve corresponder exatamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>propriedade para obter um exemplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: Também pode vincular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: Uma funcionalidade do <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>é que pode conter objetos de vários tipos, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>só é possível vincular a essa uma lista quando todos os itens na lista são do mesmo tipo como o primeiro item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Isto significa que todos os objetos tem de ser do mesmo tipo ou tem de herdar da mesma classe que o primeiro item na lista.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se for o primeiro item numa lista um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, o segundo item pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Se, por outro lado, o primeiro item é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>o objeto segundo não pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: Adicional, o <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>tem de ter itens no mesmo quando está vinculado.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: Vazio <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>resultará numa grelha vazia.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the objects in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, os objetos para o <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>tem de conter propriedades públicas.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: Quando se vincula a uma <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>para "ArrayList" (o nome do tipo).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An object that functions as a data source.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que funciona como uma origem de dados.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>valor da propriedade foi alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceChanged event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> value changes, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> changes.
trans-unit.target: O evento DataSourceChanged ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>valor alterações, ou quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>alterações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disposes dos recursos (que não seja memória) utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>para a memória foi occupying pode ser recuperada através da recolha de lixo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Requests an end to an edit operation taking place on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Os pedidos de um fim para um ocorridos de operação de edição no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The EndEdit method returns `false` if the user is not editing (typing into) a cell.
trans-unit.target: O método EndEdit devolve `false` se o utilizador não é Editar (digitar no) uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to cease editing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> cessar a editar.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to cease editing.
trans-unit.target: O número da linha cessar a editar.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current operation should be stopped.
trans-unit.target: Definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se a operação atual deve ser parada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing operation ceases; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a operação de edição ceases; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Termina a inicialização de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> que é utilizada num formulário ou utilizada por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: A inicialização ocorre em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Ambiente de estrutura do Visual Studio utiliza este método para terminar a inicialização de um componente que é utilizada num formulário ou a ser utilizada por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>método inicia a inicialização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>e métodos de EndInit impede que o controlo a ser utilizada antes de ser completamente inicializada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Displays child relations, if any exist, for all rows or a specific row.
trans-unit.target: Mostra as relações de subordinados, se qualquer um, para todas as linhas ou numa linha específica.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to expand.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha para expandir.

trans-unit.source: If set to -1, all rows are expanded.
trans-unit.target: Se definido como -1, todas as linhas são expandidas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the first visible column in a grid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da primeira coluna visível na grelha.

trans-unit.source: A column is considered visible even if it is partially concealed.
trans-unit.target: Uma coluna é considerada visível, mesmo se parcialmente está a ser concealed.

trans-unit.source: If a particular column is not visible, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property to the cell that should be visible.
trans-unit.target: Se uma determinada coluna não está visível, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>propriedade à célula que deve estar visível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid displays in flat mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a grelha apresenta no modo simples.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grid is displayed flat; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a grelha for apresentada flat; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.FlatMode*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.FlatMode*>foi alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.FlatMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color (typically the color of the text) property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a propriedade de (normalmente, a cor do texto) de cor de primeiro plano do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText*> color.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText*>cor.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.WindowText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of the cell specified by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> da célula especificada pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"></xref> to look up.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell"> </xref> para procurar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the current cell's corners.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define cantos a célula actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> of the cell specified by row and column number.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> da célula especificada pelo número de linha e coluna.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the cell bounds for the currently selected cell, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCurrentCellBounds%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os limites de célula para a célula seleccionada actualmente, utilize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCurrentCellBounds%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCurrentCellBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the cell's row.
trans-unit.target: O número de linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: The number of the cell's column.
trans-unit.target: O número de coluna da célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the current cell's corners.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define cantos a célula actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the four corners of the selected cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que especifica os quatro cantos da célula selecionada.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the cell bounds for a cell other than the current cell, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCellBounds%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter os limites de célula para uma célula que não seja a célula actual, utilize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCellBounds%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GetCellBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that defines the current cell's corners.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que define cantos a célula actual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that is the delimiter between columns when row contents are copied to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia que é o delimitador entre colunas, quando o conteúdo de linha é copiado para a área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: The string value "\t", which represents a tab used to separate columns in a row.
trans-unit.target: O valor da cadeia "\t", que representa um separador utilizado para separar colunas numa linha.

trans-unit.source: Listens for the scroll event of the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Escuta para o evento de deslocamento da barra de deslocamento horizontal.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o controlo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor das linhas de grelha.

trans-unit.source: No grid line is displayed if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GridLineStyle%2A> property is set to `DataGridLineStyle.None`.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma linha de grelha é apresentada se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GridLineStyle%2A>propriedade está definida como `DataGridLineStyle.None`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.GridLineStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of the grid lines.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor das linhas de grelha.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for controls (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>).
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é a cor do sistema para controlos (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>).</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>

trans-unit.source: The value is not set.
trans-unit.target: O valor não está definido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line style of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de linha de grelha.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridLineStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridLineStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Solid" name="Solid" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Solid" name="Solid" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Listens for the scroll event of the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Escuta para o evento de deslocamento da barra de deslocamento vertical.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o controlo.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of all row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de fundo de todos os cabeçalhos de linha e coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de fundo dos cabeçalhos de linha e coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for controls, <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é a cor do sistema para controlos, <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control*>

trans-unit.source: While trying to set the property, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Empty" name="Color.Empty" href=""></xref> was passed.
trans-unit.target: Ao tentar definir a propriedade, um <xref uid="langword_csharp_Color.Empty" name="Color.Empty" href=""> </xref> foi transmitido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font used for column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de letra para os cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method only if you are either creating a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, or creating your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, utiliza este método apenas se estiver a criar ou um estruturador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, ou criar o seus próprios controlo incorporando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that represents the header text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> que representa o texto do cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano dos cabeçalhos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the foreground color of the grid's column headers, including the column header text and the plus/minus glyphs.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de primeiro plano dos cabeçalhos de coluna da grelha, incluindo o texto do cabeçalho de coluna e o sinal de adição/menos glyphs.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText*> color.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText*>cor.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ControlText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets information, such as row and column number of a clicked point on the grid, about the grid using a specific <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações sobre a grelha utilizando específico, como o número de linha e coluna de um ponto de clicked na grelha, <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>, in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control, is used to determine which part of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control the user has clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>, juntamente com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlar, é utilizado para determinar que parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlo, o utilizador tiver clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> contains the row, column, and part of the grid that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>contém a linha, a coluna e a parte da grelha que foi clicada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Type%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Type%2A>propriedade devolve um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestType> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method takes an x and y argument supplied by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragOver>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel> events.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent rows of a table are visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as linhas principais de uma tabela estão visíveis.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default width of the grid columns in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura predefinida das colunas da grelha em pixéis.

trans-unit.source: Set this property before resetting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties (either separately, or through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method), or the property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Defina esta propriedade antes de repor o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>Propriedades (ou separadamente, ou através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>método), ou a propriedade não tem qualquer efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property cannot be set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade não é possível definir um valor inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: The default width (in pixels) of columns in the grid.
trans-unit.target: A largura predefinida (em pixéis) de colunas na grelha.

trans-unit.source: The property value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade é inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the preferred row height for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message and returns a value indicating if the key was consumed.
trans-unit.target: Previews uma mensagem de teclado e devolve um valor que indica se a chave foi consumida.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado por um controlo subordinado quando o controlo subordinado recebe uma mensagem de teclado.

trans-unit.source: The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message.
trans-unit.target: O controlo subordinado chama este método antes de gerar quaisquer eventos de teclado para a mensagem.

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message consumed and does not generate any keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: Se este método devolve `true`, o controlo subordinado considera que a mensagem consumida e não gera quaisquer eventos de teclado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> that contains data about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> que contém dados sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: The parameter is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro é transmitido por referência.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the key was consumed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se a chave foi consumida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> que contém dados sobre os quais a chave de premido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a grelha está no modo só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: In read-only mode, the grid can be scrolled, nodes can be expanded or collapsed, and so on.
trans-unit.target: No modo só de leitura, pode deslocar a grelha, podem ser expandidos ou fechados, nós e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: However, no additions, edits, or deletes can take place.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, não existem adições, as edições ou elimina pode ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> also has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A> property that can be set to true to prevent data from being edited, on a column-by-column basis.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>também tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade que pode ser definida como true para impedir que os dados que está a ser editado, com base numa coluna por coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: The ReadOnly can be set to true if you want to prohibit the user from editing the data directly in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O ReadOnly pode ser definida como verdadeira se pretende proibir o utilizador de editar os dados diretamente no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to let users to see all columns in a table, but allow them to edit specific fields only through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls on a different form.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, poderá pretender permitir que os utilizadores para ver todas as colunas existentes numa tabela, mas permitir-lhe editar campos específicos apenas através de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>controlos num formulário diferentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grid is in read-only mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a grelha estiver no modo só de leitura; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> property to `false`.

trans-unit.target: Conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>do objeto de tabela de grelha para <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>de <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects, one for each grid column you want to show, to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos, um para cada coluna de grelha que pretende mostrar, como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>de cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>para <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> object to the collection returned by TableStyles property.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objeto à coleção devolvido pela propriedade TableStyles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Sempre criar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos e adicioná-los ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>antes de adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objetos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Quando adiciona um vazio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valor à coleção, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos gerados automaticamente para si.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, será emitida uma exceção se tenta adicionar novos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valores <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> de duplicados</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Unselects a specified row.
trans-unit.target: Unselects uma linha especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A> methods to manipulate the selection state of a particular row.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A>métodos para manipular o estado de selecção de uma linha específica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>

trans-unit.target: O índice da linha para desmarcar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a barra de deslocamento vertical do controlo.

trans-unit.source: The vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> da grelha.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visible columns.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de colunas visíveis.

trans-unit.source: The number of visible columns can change depending on their width.
trans-unit.target: Pode alterar o número de colunas visíveis consoante os respetivos largura.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a default width for all columns is set, but the width of a new column is set twice as large, the number of visible columns can be reduced by at least one.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se está definida uma largura predefinida para todas as colunas, mas a largura de uma nova coluna está definida duas vezes como grande, o número de colunas visíveis pode ser reduzido pelo menos um.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns visible in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: O número de colunas visíveis na janela viewport.

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the rectangular area through which the grid is visible.
trans-unit.target: A janela viewport é a área retangular através do qual a grelha está visível.

trans-unit.source: The size of the viewport depends on the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control; if you allow users to resize the control, the viewport will also be affected.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da janela viewport depende do tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controlar; se permitir que os utilizadores redimensionar o controlo, a janela viewport será também afetada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de linhas visíveis.

trans-unit.source: The number of visible rows can be changed at run time if the user is allowed to resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser alterado o número de linhas visíveis em tempo de execução se o utilizador tem permissão para redimensionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows visible in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas visíveis na janela viewport.

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the rectangular area through which the grid is visible.
trans-unit.target: A janela viewport é a área retangular através do qual a grelha está visível.

trans-unit.source: The size of the viewport depends on the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control; if you allow users to resize the control, the viewport will also be affected.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da janela viewport depende do tamanho do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controlar; se permitir que os utilizadores redimensionar o controlo, a janela viewport será também afetada.
